dtliExcerpt: Don’t expect a taste of medicine beneath the heaping spoonfuls of sugar: It’s a laugh-out-loud musical comedy with a massive dose of heart. If that combination sounds unlikely, the creators pull off an impressive balancing act in relishing joy and humor amid striving and strife.
